title: Creative Design Project for a Sustainable Future

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental science knowledge (ecosystems, resource cycles) and basic logical reasoning for problem-solving
context.additional_context: Performing community problem-solving simulations in a VR environment and conducting collaborative learning using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can create design proposals considering diverse stakeholder perspectives (government, businesses, residents) to analyze community sustainability issues (e.g., waste management, energy conservation)
Learners can establish creative problem-solving strategies through global case comparisons and validate proposal feasibility in VR simulations
Learners can iteratively improve design proposals based on peer assessment and instructor feedback to finalize project reports and presentation materials
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
